body_text:
A yaoi manga about a guy blackmailing and taking advantage of his friend's father, who was a former porn actor The manga is about a guy who occasionally goes over to his friend's house, where he meets his friend's dad (who is divorced by the way) and falls in love with him, though at this point, he doesn't plan to do anything to express his feeling. Then one day, as he is watching some porn, he finds a video with his friend's dad in it. He uses it to blackmail him, by threatening to show the video to his son if he doesn't do what he says, and takes advantage of him. That lasts until one day, when his friend walks in on them. However, his friend says that he isn't shocked, and he already knew about the video, because he found it when he was younger, and his mom also explained about it to him. He then says that he is happy for them and leaves. In the end, they fall in love.
Please help me find this manga, because I want to read it again. Thanks.
